info.name: Adiwarna API
info.description: Complete comprehensive API collection for Adiwarna ERP System with all endpoints and detailed descriptions

item.name: 1. Authentication

request.description: Authenticate user and get access token. Token will be automatically saved to environment variable.
Revoke current access token and logout user
Get authenticated user information

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, logout, and getting current user information

item.name: 2. User Management

query.description: Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)
Search by name, email, or phone number
Filter by user role: admin, teknisi, or user

request.description: Get paginated list of users with optional search and filter by role

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "phone": "081234567890",
    "usertype": "admin",
    "password": "password123",
    "password_confirmation": "password123"
}

request.description: Create a new user. Usertype options: admin, teknisi, user
Get specific user by ID
Update existing user. All fields are optional. Password only required if changing.
Delete user. Admin cannot delete themselves.

item.description: User management endpoints (Admin only). Manage system users with different roles.

item.name: 3. Customers

request.description: Get paginated list of customers with their locations
Create a new customer
Get specific customer by ID with locations
Update existing customer
Delete customer and associated locations

item.description: Customer management endpoints. Manage customer data and locations.

item.name: 4. Employees

request.description: Get paginated list of employees
Create a new employee
Get specific employee by ID
Update existing employee
Delete employee

item.description: Employee management endpoints. Manage employee data.

item.name: 5. Quotations

request.description: Get paginated list of quotations with optional customer filter
Create quotation with items, adiwarnas, and clients in single transaction
Get quotation with customer, items, adiwarnas, and clients
Update quotation and replace all items
Delete quotation and all associated items

item.description: Quotation management with items, adiwarnas, and clients

request.description: Get paginated list of purchase orders
Create purchase order with items in single transaction
Get purchase order with customer and items
Update purchase order and replace all items
Delete purchase order and all associated items
Get paginated list of work assignments
Create work assignment with employees in single transaction
Get work assignment with customer, location, and employees
Update work assignment and replace all employees
Delete work assignment and all associated employees

item.name: 8. Daily Activities

request.description: Get paginated list of daily activities (role-based filtering)
Create daily activity with members and descriptions
Get daily activity with customer, members, and descriptions
Update daily activity and replace all members and descriptions
Delete daily activity and all associated data

item.description: Daily Activity management with members and descriptions

request.description: Get paginated list of schedules
Create schedule with items
Get schedule with customer and items
Update schedule and replace all items
Delete schedule and all associated items
Get paginated list of work orders
Create work order with employees
Get work order with customer and employees
Update work order and replace all employees
Delete work order and all associated employees
Get paginated list of document transmittals
Create document transmittal with documents
Get document transmittal with customer and documents
Update document transmittal and replace all documents
Delete document transmittal and all associated documents
Get paginated list of purchase requisitions
Create purchase requisition with items and auto-calculate total
Get purchase requisition with items

body.raw:
{
    "pr_no": "PR-2024-001-REV",
    "pr_year": 2024,
    "date": "2024-01-16",
    "supplier": "PT Supplier ABC",
    "delivery_place": "Jakarta Warehouse",
    "discount": 7.5,
    "notes": "Updated purchase requisition",
    "items": [
        {
            "qty": 15,
            "unit": "pcs",
            "description": "Steel pipe 2 inch",
            "unit_price": 48000
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Update purchase requisition and replace all items
Delete purchase requisition and all associated items

item.name: 13. Material Receiving Reports

request.description: Get paginated list of material receiving reports
Create material receiving report with items
Get material receiving report with items
Update material receiving report and replace all items
Delete material receiving report and all associated items

item.description: Material Receiving Report management with items

request.description: Get paginated list of general equipment

body.raw:
{
    "equipment_name": "Compressor Unit 01",
    "equipment_type": "Compressor",
    "quantity": 1,
    "condition": "Good",
    "specifications": "High pressure air compressor, 10 HP",
    "purchase_date": "2023-01-15",
    "notes": "Regular maintenance required"
}

request.description: Create general equipment record
Get specific general equipment by ID

body.raw:
{
    "equipment_name": "Compressor Unit 01 - Updated",
    "equipment_type": "Compressor",
    "quantity": 1,
    "condition": "Excellent",
    "specifications": "High pressure air compressor, 10 HP, serviced",
    "purchase_date": "2023-01-15",
    "notes": "Recently serviced"
}

request.description: Update general equipment record
Delete general equipment record
Get paginated list of project equipment

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "equipment_name": "Welding Machine",
    "equipment_type": "Welding",
    "quantity": 2,
    "condition": "Good",
    "specifications": "Industrial welding machine, 220V",
    "project_name": "Project Alpha",
    "notes": "Assigned to Project Alpha"
}

request.description: Create project equipment record
Get specific project equipment by ID with customer

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "equipment_name": "Welding Machine - Updated",
    "equipment_type": "Welding",
    "quantity": 2,
    "condition": "Excellent",
    "specifications": "Industrial welding machine, 220V, serviced",
    "project_name": "Project Alpha",
    "notes": "Recently serviced and assigned to Project Alpha"
}

request.description: Update project equipment record
Delete project equipment record
Get paginated list of track records

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "project_name": "Project Alpha",
    "project_year": 2024,
    "project_value": 500000000,
    "description": "Major infrastructure project",
    "status": "ongoing",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-12-31"
}

request.description: Create track record
Get specific track record by ID with customer

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "project_name": "Project Alpha - Updated",
    "project_year": 2024,
    "project_value": 550000000,
    "description": "Major infrastructure project - Updated scope",
    "status": "ongoing",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-12-31"
}

request.description: Update track record
Delete track record
Get paginated list of operational records

body.raw:
{
    "date": "2024-01-15",
    "activity_type": "Maintenance",
    "description": "Regular equipment maintenance",
    "cost": 5000000,
    "notes": "Scheduled maintenance completed"
}

request.description: Create operational record
Get specific operational record by ID

body.raw:
{
    "date": "2024-01-16",
    "activity_type": "Maintenance",
    "description": "Regular equipment maintenance - Updated",
    "cost": 5500000,
    "notes": "Scheduled maintenance completed with additional work"
}

request.description: Update operational record
Delete operational record
Get all company information records
Get currently active company information

body.raw:
{
    "company_name": "PT Adiwarna Alam Raya",
    "address": "Jakarta, Indonesia",
    "phone": "021-1234567",
    "email": "info@adiwarna.com",
    "description": "Leading company in industrial services",
    "vision": "To be the best industrial service provider",
    "mission": "Providing excellent service to our customers",
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create company information record. Setting is_active to true will deactivate other records.
Get specific company information by ID

body.raw:
{
    "company_name": "PT Adiwarna Alam Raya",
    "address": "Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia",
    "phone": "021-1234567",
    "email": "info@adiwarna.com",
    "description": "Leading company in industrial services - Updated",
    "vision": "To be the best industrial service provider in Indonesia",
    "mission": "Providing excellent service to our customers with integrity",
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Update company information. Setting is_active to true will deactivate other records.
Delete company information record
Get paginated list of payroll projects

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "project_name": "Project Alpha Payroll",
    "project_code": "PA-2024",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-12-31",
    "description": "Payroll management for Project Alpha",
    "status": "active"
}

request.description: Create payroll project
Get specific payroll project by ID with customer

body.raw:
{
    "customer_id": 1,
    "project_name": "Project Alpha Payroll - Updated",
    "project_code": "PA-2024",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-12-31",
    "description": "Payroll management for Project Alpha - Updated",
    "status": "active"
}

request.description: Update payroll project
Delete payroll project and all associated periods
Get paginated list of payroll periods for a specific project

body.raw:
{
    "period_name": "January 2024",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-01-31",
    "payment_date": "2024-02-05",
    "status": "open",
    "notes": "Payroll period for January 2024"
}

request.description: Create payroll period for a project
Get specific payroll period by ID with project

body.raw:
{
    "period_name": "January 2024 - Updated",
    "start_date": "2024-01-01",
    "end_date": "2024-01-31",
    "payment_date": "2024-02-07",
    "status": "closed",
    "notes": "Payroll period for January 2024 - Closed"
}

request.description: Update payroll period
Delete payroll period and all associated employees
Get paginated list of payroll employees for a specific period

body.raw:
{
    "employee_id": 1,
    "base_salary": 5000000,
    "allowances": 1000000,
    "deductions": 500000,
    "overtime_hours": 10,
    "overtime_rate": 50000,
    "notes": "Regular employee payroll"
}

request.description: Create payroll employee for a period. Total salary will be auto-calculated.
Get specific payroll employee by ID with employee and period details

body.raw:
{
    "employee_id": 1,
    "base_salary": 5500000,
    "allowances": 1200000,
    "deductions": 550000,
    "overtime_hours": 15,
    "overtime_rate": 50000,
    "notes": "Updated employee payroll with bonus"
}

request.description: Update payroll employee. Total salary will be recalculated.
Recalculate total salary for payroll employee based on current values
Delete payroll employee and all associated timesheets

item.name: 22. Payroll Timesheets

request.description: Get all timesheets for a specific payroll employee

body.raw:
{
    "date": "2024-01-15",
    "hours_worked": 8,
    "overtime_hours": 2,
    "status": "present",
    "notes": "Regular work day with overtime"
}

request.description: Create timesheet entry for a payroll employee
Update timesheet entry for a specific date
Create or update multiple timesheet entries at once
Delete timesheet entry for a specific date

item.description: Payroll Timesheet management (nested under payroll employees)

request.description: Generate payroll slips for all employees in a period
Get paginated list of payroll slips for a specific period
Get specific payroll slip by ID with employee and period details
Delete payroll slip
